skills.name: Flame Nova
skills.description: Explodes compressed energy of fire to inflict damage to an enemy. The more HP the targeted enemy currently has, the larger the damage becomes.

skills.name: Eternity (Passive)
skills.description: Recovers the HP of all allies by 10% every turn, and rises from the ashes at the moment of death with 100% HP. [Automatic Effect]
